name: Intelligence: Anime girls
description:
Intelligence: Anime girls - a puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with beautiful anime girls) so that the picture was like the original image. Move the puzzle tiles wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images. The essence of the game as in the old game "Tag" (15). The game will have 6 levels with 3x3 field size and 6 other levels with 4x4 field size. Each level has a different image.
The game contains images of twelve anime girls.

Key features:
- 12 different levels
- Random generation of tiles at the start of the level
- Developing the brain
- Achievements!
